name: nestjs-eve-auth
description: NestJS package to support EVE SSO authentication flow

scripts.start: docker compose up -d && cd lib && npm run build && cd ../dev && npm run start:dev
scripts.lint: npm run lint:dev && npm run lint:lib
scripts.preversion: if [ $(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) != 'main' ]; then exit 1; fi
